sessions.name: Directives Masterclass
sessions.abstract: In this session you will learn the ins and outs of directives!

sessions.name: Scope for fun and profit
sessions.abstract: This session will take a closer look at scopes. Learn what they do and how to use them.

sessions.abstract: Controllers are the beginning... Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus.
